ui.title: Clean Files
ui.no_results: No files found that need cleaning
ui.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete the following {{count}} items? This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Clean Files Settings
settings.language_desc: Select the display language for the plugin interface
settings.cleanable_extensions_desc: Files with these extensions will be identified as cleanable
settings.protected_extensions_desc: Files with these extensions will be protected from cleaning
settings.max_scan_depth_desc: Set the maximum depth for scanning folders (0 means unlimited)
settings.exclude_hidden_desc: Whether to exclude hidden files and folders during scanning
settings.min_file_size_desc: Only scan files larger than this size (0 means scan all files)
settings.reset_settings_desc: Reset all settings to default values

messages.select_items_first: Please select items to delete first
